body_content.explanation: a clever action in a game or other situation that is intended to achieve an advantage and usually involves taking a risk:
examples: Her clever opening gambit gave her an early advantage.
Their promise to lower taxes is clearly an election-year gambit.

body_content.explanation: a way of beginning a game of chess, in which you intentionally lose a pawn (= game piece) in order to win some other form of advantage later
a remark that you make to someone in order to start a conversation:
examples: "I hear you're a friend of Jamie's" was her opening gambit.
